title: Khoobsurat
writer: D.N. Mukherjee, Indira Bisht, Juhi Chaturvedi
short_cast: Sonam Kapoor, Fawad Khan, Kiron Kher, Ratna Pathak Shah, Amir Raza Hussain, Ashok Banthia, Kaizaad Kotwal, Rishabh Chaddha
cast: Sonam Kapoor, Fawad Khan, Kiron Kher, Ratna Pathak Shah, Amir Raza Hussain, Ashok Banthia, Kaizaad Kotwal, Rishabh Chaddha

desc: A free-spirited doctor is hired to assist an injured king and winds up challenging his family's tradition-bound lifestyle as she falls for his son.
